website_summaries.verdict: Elegant tabletop option for wine lovers and design enthusiasts.
pros: Thanks to the glass construction, your beautiful wine bottles are on full display with this chiller
It's easy to spot when the bottle is almost empty, too
The dual-layer glass keeps condensation from occurring
Features an affordable price tag as well
cons: Doesn't fit large champagne bottles and works best when wine is already chilled prior to insertion

customer_reviews.title: It’s not a “chiller.”  It’s not.
customer_reviews.text: Two stars for the look. That’s it. I was skeptical but decided to trust the reviewers. Well.. regret followed as it didn’t work. Of course it didn’t work! It’s just an acrylic coaster with long double wall! That’s it. Nothing fancy or magical about it. So no surprise that it didn’t keep the white wine nor champaigne chilled for a long time. Only reason we just kept it is because my wife liked the look of it better than the steel chillers. But not quite functional. It’s just wrong to call it a “chiller” as it’s really not.
customer_reviews.author: HuzuBarista

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I had a dinner party and this iceless wine cooler was perfect. I was able to keep the white wine out and available for my guests. No mess of ice or constantly going to the refrigerator. It kept the wine perfectly chilled. Also, it is classy and you can read the wine label without taking it out of the cooler. I would highly recommend this item. Amazing item!
customer_reviews.author: CLayton

customer_reviews.title: Great wine chiller for indoor or outdoor use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my Chardonnay/French Burgundy loving Father, and he couldn't wait to try it out immediately. We used it at an outdoor evening concert on a 85 degree day, and it kept our chilled bottle of wine "chilled" for a good 50 minutes (until the bottle was gone...) The wine temp was perfect and refreshing, and I'm hoping someday we'll get to see if it stays cold for longer than an hour - but for now, we're happy!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Ahearn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a real wine enthusiast and I saw this at a friend's house. She loved it so I bought one. It really works! Keeps white or rose wine chilled without the bother and mess of ice. It's VERY convenient. I liked it so much I bought one for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: VNN

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have a Sodastream bottle on my desk almost every waking hour. I was hoping this would make my drinks stay colder, longer. It does. Don't expect magic... there's no electricity or ice here. It's just a giant coozi. But coozis work, which is why they are popular. Without this gadget, my drinks would reach room temperature in about an hour. Now they last almost 4 hours. I consider that worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Let the bottle show and no evaporation
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these for my lovely wood dining table. I put beautiful wine bottles in them (one white and one red). They show through the material beautifully. No drips or evaporation in two years. I do put a stone under each one also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with one problem...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the wine perfectly chilled. 5 stars for quality! However "almost any sized bottle of red wine, white wine, or champagne" is a problem. I wish they would've made it a tiny bit wider, as some rosé bottles from the south of france are shaped more like pinot bottles and are a bit wider and don't fit... Otherwise an excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a party where I was serving white wine. I'm not a big white wine drinker so I never really needed anything like this before, and would put the bottle in ice if I was serving. This item worked great, keeping the wine chilled for hours, without having water from the melted ice drip all over everything and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: This will only accommodate the standard size wine bottle the diameter inside is smaller than advertised very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Speeddemon66

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: keeps wine 40 degree white wine cool for hours (indoors at 68 degrees). bottle label is visible. no ice required. works, i guess, because cold air falls & warm air rises. might consider a round pot holder with large button hole in center to place on top of bottle/cooler in hot outdoor conditions........
customer_reviews.author: dpm

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing but not functional
customer_reviews.text: Not really great at keeping the bottle cool. There's a lot of space between the walls of the cooler and the bottle, so the chill escapes easily. There are other "thermos" type chillers out there that are much better in a similar price range.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Described
customer_reviews.text: This Wine Chiller looks good and keeps a chilled bottle of wine cold for at least an hour. Perfect when we take a bottle of white wine and some hors d'oeuvres to the porch! It arrived on time, was well packed for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Otto

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our bar for guests
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one of these a few weeks ago and ordered two more for Thanksgiving. We really like the design, particularly the height of the chiller and the fact that you can read the label through the side. They kept our wines at a nice temperature throughout our evening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as is
customer_reviews.text: Does not keep wine chilled in less you place in refrigerator first. I opened the container and put water between the layers and stuck in freezer to see if that will work
customer_reviews.author: Mike R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product and have received compliments from my guests! I highly recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Pretty but does not work to keep wine bottle cold. I don't recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift. But they loved it and use it. It works.

customer_reviews.title: 100 degrees outside and the wine stays cool
customer_reviews.text: It’s 100 plus degrees here and n Texas. We’ve used our new wine cooler every night outside by the pool and it’s kept our white wine chilled. We were both thinking how nice they ( I purchased 2) will look on the table for thanksgiving when the family comes

customer_reviews.title: A better looking acrylic chiller
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift. I was afraid it could look like junky acrylic, but was pleasantly surprised at the fine appearance. Wish the outer cardboard box looked at little more upscale.

customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend for a boat-warming gift. Came nicely packaged. Good quality. Her husband loves it

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wine Bottle Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this product a couple of times to date but have functioned as intended both times. The coolers do keep the wine chilled for a longer period of time and allows you to see the wine label through the transparent sides. There hasn’t been any condensation so far, just wipe clean with damp towel and can be stored anywhere.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product !
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Very pleased with product!

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. A little bit of cold water ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. A little bit of cold water in the bottom as other people have suggested isn’t necessary but will prolong the cooling.

customer_reviews.text: It held the white wine for several hours at a perfect temperature. A very attractive item.

customer_reviews.title: ... I don't find that it helps keep the wine cool for any longer than without it
customer_reviews.text: I've only tried to use this a few times but I don't find that it helps keep the wine cool for any longer than without it.

customer_reviews.text: Very smart looking with the substantial stainless steel top ring. The clear plastic allows not only identifying the wine but also the amount left. And, no messy ice cubes!

customer_reviews.title: I DO NOT like completing surveys or reviews. I’ve given a great review to your product.
customer_reviews.text: I DO NOT like completing surveys or reviews. I’ve given a great review to your product. I shouldn’t have complete anything else. If I had given a bad review I would be glad to explain.

customer_reviews.title: Great! A very nice product! Love it! You can buy it that will not regret! Very good product for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Great! A very nice product! Love it! You can buy it that will not regret! Very good product for sure!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They add a really nice look to wine bottles when keeping them outside a fridge/cooler.

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Just right for my small dining area and worked quite well when hosted my supper club.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: works fine
customer_reviews.text: it really does work, even here in the heat of summer in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Erpilot

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to hold a chilled bottle of wine during dinner. We often have dinner out on the porch in the summer and it's a pain to keep going to the kitchen to get wine refills. This is exactly what I was looking for. It keeps a chilled bottle of wine chilled with no mess. No need for ice. No dripping water. No cleanup. Since we only use it during dinner, I can't speak to how long it will actually keep a bottle chilled but if you're looking for something to keep wine chilled during a meal, this is it. It also hold a champagne bottle nicely. Buying more for Christmas gifts this year.
customer_reviews.author: T. Foxx

customer_reviews.title: good for restaurants
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my restaurant, they work just fine,fits most normal size bottles including Champagne, the finish is holding up fine after a few months

customer_reviews.title: I Love SCIENCE when it helps me Drink
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Idk how the do it. Science!! I was skeptical but I took it to Miami. It was 78 degrees and it worked to keep champage cold for 1.5 hrs outside on the beach!!

customer_reviews.title: Double-Wall Iceless Wine Bottle Chiller

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping the sweat off the table
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping the sweat off the table, but it does not keep the wine cold, even after pre-chilling in freezer for days before use. Too small to put ice in unless you crush it. But looks nice on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria, VA

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a place in Hawaii where we enjoy having pupus with wine & watching the sunsets in the evenings. But if you took the bottle out to the lanai with you, it was covered in condensation in minutes, and the wine warmed up pretty fast. This little cooler works fantastically to solve both problems. It kept our wine cool for at least the hour & a half that we sat out, and there was zero condensation. I'm loving it. Am going to order again for our home on the mainland. It's also nice being able to see thru the cooler to know how just much wine is left.
customer_reviews.author: Justa Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Looks sleek and elegant and works well keeping chilled wine cold.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kohnle

customer_reviews.title: Handsome and Useful
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and keeps wine at the right temperature for a good hour.
customer_reviews.author: Hurry Hurry

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't chill wine
customer_reviews.text: This product does not actually work, at least for me. Except for the bottom, there's no contact with the bottle, and because it's plastic, that seems rather ineffective already. If one added icewater, that would actually chill the wine, but that is not the point of the product and it's really not wide enough to fit any ice in, except maybe a few cubes at the top. On the positive side, it looks nice and you can see the label clearly. But given it's labelled as an iceless wine chiller, I would say it's a major failure.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Swett

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: Not very useful because it's not wide enough to put ice and a bottle. Other than that, the quality is decent
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Wilkie

customer_reviews.title: This works, but
customer_reviews.text: This works but your champagne must be really cold -- I mean chilled overnight in a very cold refrigerator. And since it is open at the top, you shouldn't dawdle finishing off the bottle. But if you want to get rid of the hassle of ice and the old fashioned champagne bucket, this should work satisfactorily for you. The old fashioned champagne bucket with ice water is still superior. Update -- a week later. I just changed my review from 3 stars to 1 star. This thing just doesn't keep champagne cold enough. Complaints from guests and my wife. The latter encouraged me to send it back as only a darling wife can...
customer_reviews.author: MyOnlineOpinions

customer_reviews.title: Functional with a nice presentation
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can see through the cooler, this makes it nice for setting multiple bottles of wine out for a party. The cooler kept our wine cool for about 3 hours. It makes a nice presentation. I purchased one, but I would like to get more for setting out a variety of white wines when entertaining. it's light weight and you do not need to keep it in the freezer.

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping wine cool while dining outside.

customer_reviews.text: I don't drink white wine but often have guests that do. I was skeptical that this would work but it absolutely does. We did a side-by-side test with this item and one of those freezable collars. This kept the wine icy cold for 3 hours and the frozen collar kept the other bottle cold for about 20 minutes.

product_meta.title: Wine Enthusiast Double Walled Iceless Wine Bottle Chiller
feature_bullets: NO ICE REQUIRED - Looking for a way to keep your wine bottle chilled without having to worry about melting ice? The Double Walled Iceless Chiller by Wine Enthusiast features a thermal insulated design that keeps wine cold without the mess and hassle of traditional ice buckets.

CHILL FOR 3 HOURS - Simply place your pre-chilled wine in the bucket and enjoy 3 hours of cold wine or champagne. There's no need to put your wine chiller in the freezer beforehand or have to worry about messy condensation.
CLEAR ACRYLIC - A modern twist on the classic wine bottle bucket cooler, the transparent BPA-free acrylic construction allows you to easily read the bottle's label without having to pull it out.

FORMAL OR CASUAL EVENTS - The clean minimal design of the tabletop wine cooler has a contrasting stainless steel accent rim that blends in seamlessly with any home decor, yet is elegant enough for formal events or everyday use.
SPECS - The wine cooler bucket can be used with almost any sized bottle of red wine, white wine, or champagne. Measures 9" high x 4.75" diameter. Hand wash only.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars270 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
